message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $150. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me at $175?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your position on the price. I'm willing to go up to $160 for the product. Would you consider this offer?
